title: Boulevard BQ
content:
Can anyone tell me a the name of a font that looks like Boulevard BQ? I only need to do one invitation with it and $99 is too much to spend for a font.

 [‹ script typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011013456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45121 "Go to previous forum topic") [the kills album typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011013456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42291 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Susiequs
